transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Namaste, I am Abhishek speaking from IndiaMART.
Customer: Who?
Executive: Sir, Abhishek is speaking from IndiaMART. 
Customer: Ha Abhishek, ha boliye na.
Executive: Haan ji, sir aapka concern raise kiya tha aapne buyleads ko leke ki bulk ki lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan sir sab retailer hi aa rahi hai 1 kg, 2 kg, 5 kg ka sab wohi aa raha hai TrustSeal mein bhi.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Bulk mein lead ka maine complain kiya ke baad kal maine dekhi woh 2 ton, 3 ton wali lead maine kal dekhi woh, woh bhi complain karne ke baad.
Customer: Usse pehle toh sab 1 kg, 2 kg, 5 kg, 10 kg maine woh sab whatsapp ka screenshot khich ke maine Sunil Choudhary ko bhi bheja hai.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Toh matlab aap ek baar mere ko bhi bhej dena kyunki aapka account na main handle karta hu, main aapka account manager hu.
Customer: Haan toh mere ko aap aapka whatsapp pe hi kar do na, main aapka number save kar leta hu.
Executive: Theek hai, baki aap matlab main ye bhi dekh raha tha calls and inquiries mein matlab active nahi rehte itna, isme main aapka call ratio bhi dekh raha tha na ki aap kitne calls uthate hai bahar ke, woh bhi aapka kafi kam hai.
Customer: Nahi sir usme kya hai woh toh call back karte hai lekin woh sab inquiry jo rehti hai na wohi rehti hai sirf woh 1 kg, 2 kg, 5 kg ki hi rehti hai.
Customer: Woh toh hum log kya ek baar aapka miss call rehta hai na woh toh number pad jata hai kaun kisne phone kiya tha, toh hum log toh woh kar lete hai uska koi dikkat nahi hai phone, agar koi factory kam mein busy ho toh phone nahi bhi utha sakte hai ya toh koi meeting mein ho toh nahi utha sakte ya toh phir driving mein ho toh nahi utha sakte, lekin woh toh call back hum log karte hai lekin maximum retail maine dekha na ke TrustSeal lene ke baad bhi jo jo bulk mein honi chahiye na woh nahi aati hai lead.
Customer: Actually TrustSeal ka meaning hum logo ne jo woh packet liya tab humko aisa bola ke jo bhi aapki bulk lead rehti hai na woh filter hoke TrustSeal ke paas chali jati hai, isliye hamare paas base jo liya rehta hai na woh usme nahi aati hai toh hum logo ne TrustSeal pe up down kiya tha TrustSeal mein jaane ke baad bhi agar humne ko 1 kilo, 2 kilo, 5 kilo, 10 kilo mein hi lena hai toh phir ye packet toh humko mehnga padega.
Customer: Reward bhi tha aana chahiye.
Customer: Amount jo hum logo ne dala hai ek lakh rupees, ek lakh rupees ka reward bhi toh milna chahiye na kuch.
Executive: Samajh gaya main sir aapki baat, aapki baat bhi theek hai, lekin kya hota hai na sir leads mein bhi kya hai ki aapka jaise aapke jaise product hai aapke competitors bhi honge aapke area mein.
Customer: Nahi sir mera mera substitute wala jo product hai na world mein koi nahi bana raha hai samajh lo.
Customer: Substitute of lapsa world mein nahi bana raha hai usko aapko kaise promote karna hai IndiaMART pe abhi aap dekho woh.
Executive: Kaunsa wala product keh rahe hai aap kaun nahi bana raha hai?
Customer: Lapsa ka replacement hai, mera product jo hai na lapsa ka replacement hai, acid slurry ka replacement means acid slurry jahan pe use hoti hai na uski jagah pe ye use kar sakte hai, acid slurry ka price suppose 125 rupees per kg hai current price toh apna 73 rupees current price, means overall production cost seedha 10 se 15 20% niche aa jayega jo bhi apna product use karega woh.
Customer: Lekin hum log kya karte hai ke acid slurry ki jo lead aati hai na usko conserve karke hum log trial karte hai ke usko convert buylead mein replacement mein kaise convert kare party ko.
Executive: Achha kyunki jaise main agar aapka ye bhi matlab competitor wagera dekhu aap hi ke area ke Antaliya Gujarat ke toh yahan pe bhi hai kafi matlab acid slurry lapsa karke isko bhi.
Customer: Main main sir main kya bol raha hu lapsa banane ko kya lapsa cheez alag hai.
Customer: Mera cheez alag hai jaisa samajh lo koi brand ka medical hai aur generic medical hai work toh wohi karega samajh lo.
Customer: Doctor koi brand prescription likhta hai jaise lapsa, main aapki chemical ki bhasha mein baat karu toh agar koi description koi generic dawa ke andar jaoge toh brand ki dawa aayegi 100 150 rupees ki generic dawa aayegi 10 20 rupees ki work wohi karega samajh gaye, same aisa hai apan jo bana rahe hai na woh lapsa ka replacement bana rahe hai ya toh phir substitute bana rahe hai means lapsa ki jagah pe ye same use karoge toh result wohi milega wohi field ke andar.
Customer: Lapsa mein competitor bahut hai replacement banane wala competitor koi nahi hai world mein sirf hum log bana rahe hai replacement toh abhi replacement of substitute lapsa jo na register kiya hua product hai ya toh phir substitute of lapsa karke register kiya hua product hai hum logo ne IndiaMART pe usko aapko kaise promote karna hai woh aap dekho taki jo bhi lapsa lene wala public hai jo bhi buy karne wala bulk mein lapsa wala product hai usko lapsa ki jagah pe hamara product dikhe.
Executive: Achha matlab woh lapsa search mare toh usko aapka product dikhe.
Customer: Yes apna product dikhe woh bhi aisa abhi aapko kaise karna hai software pe kaise usko trading karke up lana hai woh aapka kaam hai.
Executive: Isme sir hum yahi kar sakte hai ki dekho keyword ka matter karta hai ki buyer hi hai jo search karega matlab buyer jo search marega ab buyer jo search marega us hisab se hum keyword dal sakte hai ki agar woh lapsa search marta hai lapsa ki lapsa dhundhne ke liye toh lapsa dikhayenge agar woh search mar de ki substitute of lapsa.
Customer: Nahi lapsa bhi dekhiye apna jo category hai woh lapsa ke andar hi hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Lapsa ke andar hi hai samajh lo lapsa acid slurry kisi ne mara ya toh phir sulfonate apna linear alkyl benzene sulfonic acid pura naam dal ke mara ya koi acid slurry dal ke mara apan ne group toh wohi select kiya hai lekin dikkat kahan pe aati hai ke koi Gujarat se lapsa search marta hai toh usko pehle lapsa dikhata hai substitute nahi dikhata hai uski jagah pe lapsa bhi agar koi search kare na toh usko pehle keywords mein substitute dikhana chahiye toh ek baar woh price dekh ke bhi ek baar inquiry kare ke bhai ye kya cheez hai.
Executive: Samajh gaya main.
Customer: Kyunki apan ne jo likha hai substitute of lapsa hi likha hai means lapsa bhi search maroge toh woh keywords toh upar aayega hi aayega lekin abhi ki condition mein kya ho raha hai buylead jo bhi post ho rahi hai aapki woh without GST ki ho rahi hai retail mein 1 kilo, 5 kilo, 10 kilo, 15 kilo toh usme koi bhi TrustSeal ya manufacturer deal nahi karega.
Customer: Samajh lo woh retailer ka business nahi hai hamara manufacturing unit hai karodo rupees ka toh hum log woh 5000 10000 wali lead mein woh nahi jaate hai humko lead chahiye 1 ton, 2 ton, 3 ton toh uska valuation kariban uska hona chahiye 1.5 lakh 2 lakh rupees.
Executive: Samajh gaya aapki baat.
Customer: Haan aur woh bhi search marega koi keywords lapsa search marega 10000 ton 10000 kg pe toh usko uski jo front page hai us pe substitute ka show up option hona chahiye jo nahi dikh raha hai abhi.
Executive: Theek hai toh isme na aapka catalog bhi toh matlab matter karta hai aapne product ke naam wagera kya rakh rakhe hai kyunki wohi.
Customer: Woh toh hum logo ne last time abhi abhi 20 din 25 din pehle toh maine sab kuch karwaya abhi jo bhi changes karwana tha woh bhi toh karwa diya tha.
Executive: Isme woh bhi toh hote hai.
Customer: Group group bhi toh hum logo ne barabar ha group bhi toh hum logo ne barabar set kiya tha iske andar kya kaunse group mein kya karna hai sab kuch toh set kiya hua hai.
Executive: Ha category wagera.
Customer: Ha sab kuch toh category set kiya hua hai baat karke dikkat wohi hai ke jo mere ko bola tha ke TrustSeal lene ke baad jo bulk lead post hoti hai jab TrustSeal nahi tha tab mere ko aisa bola ke jo bulk lead jo post hoti hai na woh pehle TrustSeal wale ke paas jati hai woh consumption hoti ho jati hai iski wajah se woh niche wale ko dikhti nahi hai abhi toh hamara TrustSeal package hai toh humko toh dikhni chahiye na phir bhi jo humko ye TrustSeal lene ke baad bhi agar bulk lead ki jagah pe humko ye retail lead 1 kilo, 5 kilo, 10 kilo, 15 kilo, 20 kilo, 50 kilo waisi lead toh hum logo ko nahi chahiye na sir.
Executive: Sir sahi baat hai aapki bhi.
Executive: Theek hai na jaise pehle bol nahi pehle jaise aap bol rahe ho ke bada package hai uska TrustSeal ka ek verification hai apna ek symbol hai uska uske hisab se aapko business growth mein badi bhi lead milegi minimum aapko 2.5 lakh 2.5 lakh se 3 lakh ki lead jo valuation hogi uski lead aapko view karegi.
Customer: Toh uske hisab se hum log package lete hai na agar woh lead hi view nahi kar rahi hai humko aur woh 5000 10 wali lead hi apne ko show up karni hai toh meaning kya hai TrustSeal walo ko toh bhai bifurcation karo na jitna TrustSeal wale hai usko badi lead dikhao jo jitni retail lead hai woh niche jo base payment wale hai jo 25000 wale hai jo MDC wale usko woh dikhni chahiye agar aap pehle bol rahe ho apne ko ke jab apna MDC tha tab aap bol rahe ho toh ke TrustSeal wale ke wohi dikhti hai aapka TrustSeal nahi hai toh aapko nahi dikhegi badi badi lead abhi hamara TrustSeal hai toh bhi phir bhi badi lead nahi dikh rahi hai phir bhi MDC ki lead dikh rahi hai toh TrustSeal lene ka meaning kya hai apna.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aapki sahi baat hai ki TrustSeal wale ko dikhti hai woh toh hota hi hai sir MDC wale ke upar aati hai lead matlab bulk ki lead zyada tar TrustSeal wale ko kyunki woh trusted seller hai kisi ko bulk ka order karna hoga woh chote mote dukandar pe kyun jayega woh bade seller pe hi jayega woh TrustSeal wale se hi dikhta hai.
Customer: Right toh phir humne TrustSeal liya hua hai apply kiya hua hai TrustSeal apne paas hai toh apne ko badi lead aani chahiye na apne paas ye 5 kilo, 1 kilo, 2 kilo, 10 kilo ka lead aani hi nahi chahiye ye ulta ho raha hai abhi.
Executive: Samajh gaya sir aapki baat hai.
Customer: Thoda isko dhyan do sir abhi aapka.
Executive: Theek hai baki aapko buyleads wagera matlab thoda aayengi bulk mein.
Customer: Dekho buylead ka jo aapne ha buylead ka consumption lekin aayega tab karega na sir abhi aap mere ko week ka samajh lo 20 lead aur do bonus lead karke 40 ya 50 lead week ka bhi doge lekin aapki buylead 5 kilo, 10 kilo, 2 kilo, 5 kilo, 50 kilo toh main kyun consume karu woh toh isme toh meri company ki reputation down hoti hai manufacturer hoke main ye 5 kilo, 10 kilo ka business karu.
Executive: Woh toh sahi baat hai aapki.
Customer: Ha jab aapka itna bulk lead mere paas aana chahiye taki main consume kar saku aapka bulk lead hi nahi aa raha hai lead pe uske upar posting hi nahi ho raha hai toh main kyun consume karu.
Customer: Consume karne ke liye bhi samne requirement aani chahiye na woh toh mere paas aa hi nahi rahe.
Customer: Abhi maine complain karne ke baad mere ko ek do lead dikha maine Saturday complain kiya tha mere ko kal Saturday night ko mere ko 2 ton aur 20 ton ya 10 30 ton ka ek do lead dikha woh maine baat kar diya abhi jo aaya us pe hum logo ne woh purchase karke kar diya hai lekin uske samne bulk lead bhi aana chahiye na woh toh aapka aa hi nahi raha hai hamare paas.
Executive: Samajh gaya sir main aapko aayega bulk lead ab aayega aapne concern bhi raise kar diya hai main bhi dekhta hu aapke isme lead wagera ka main bhi na flow check karta rahunga.
Customer: Jo bhi hai sir aap mere ko whatsapp kar do aap mere ko whatsapp kar do abhi main aapka number whatsapp number mein save kar leta hu abhi kaise karna hai kya karna hai woh aapki responsibility hai mere ko bulk lead dikhni chahiye hum logo ne package bulk lead ka liya hai humko ye ye 2 kilo, 5 kilo, 10 kilo ka lead nahi dikhna chahiye woh aap dekho abhi usko kaise manage karna hai woh aapka issue hai.
Customer: Woh toh kaise fix karna woh aap dekho.
Executive: Samajh gaya sir main aapki baat.
Customer: Ha bhai.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Toh thoda whatsapp ka number dal do aur is pe work karo aap.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai sir.
Customer: Ha ha.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving bulk leads despite TrustSeal subscription.

- Receiving retail leads (1-10 kg) instead of bulk.

- Expects substitute product to show up in lapsa searches.

- Dissatisfied with lead quality and relevance.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the issue.

- Executive assured to check lead flow.

- Executive asked customer to share details on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check lead flow.

- Executive will follow up with the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, subscription, product promotion
